a.n: With The Wild Crowd: Live in Athens, GA

p.d: The B-52s performed their first ever gig in February 1977. On Valentine's Day 2011, 34 years later, they returned to their home town of Athens, Georgia to celebrate with this brilliant live show. Wig-wearing, boa-draped, glitter-covered fans came to join in and saw the band deliver a sizzling 90 minute set that turned Athens' Classic Center into a cosmic dancehall. A B-52s live show is always the best party in town, yet here in front of their home crowd they even managed to turn it up a notch further. Packed with all their fan's favourites, this is high spirited good time rock 'n' roll packed with great tunes, wild romance, blood pumping grooves and a lot of fun!
